=======================
 Invenio-Groups v0.1.0
=======================

Invenio-Groups v0.1.0 was released on July 31, 2015.

About
-----

Invenio module that adds support for user groups.

*This is an experimental development preview release.*

What's new
----------

- Initial public release.

Installation
------------

   $ pip install invenio-groups==0.1.0

Documentation
-------------

   http://invenio-groups.readthedocs.org/en/v0.1.0

Happy hacking and thanks for flying Invenio-Groups.
